name: Events Dashboard ETL Pipeline
description: End-to-end ETL pipeline feeding a public dashboard of events.
fullDescription: Designed and implemented a data pipeline that scrapes event data from multiple sources, transforms and cleans it, loads it into a PostgreSQL database, and exposes a Next.js dashboard interface for end-users to explore upcoming events. The pipeline runs daily via GitHub Actions, ensuring fresh and accurate data.
features: Daily automated scraping and data ingestion job via GitHub Actions
Data transformation and cleaning using Python scripts
PostgreSQL data warehouse design with optimized indexing
User-facing dashboard in Next.js with search and filters
Real-time updates from fresh data refresh jobs
Error notifications for failed ETL runs via webhook alerts
